Package chat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class holds the gui for the Client and listens to commands from it and sends them to to ClientCode Once connect is pressed, new ClientCode object is created
    ClientCode
    This class is is the main client object, holds all of the relevant variables and objects Once startRunning() is called it connects to the server and creates a new Thread which listens to messages from the server.
    ClientHolder
    Class used to make objects holding each clients name and output socket
    ClientListner
    This class is used as a Thread to Listen to messaged from the server
    ConnectionListner
    This class is used a Thread to listen to every client's messages separately Every time a new client joins a new Thread of this type is created
    server
    The class containing the gui for the server and the main class to launch it Creates a new ServerCode object when start is pressed
    ServerCode
    The class which holds all of the relevant variables and objects to the server Opens a server socket and start a Thread using SetConnection class to listen to client trying to connect
    SetConnection
    This class is used as a Thread to listen to clients trying to connect to the server on the server socket we opened.
